title: Be Well Natural Medicine - Naturopathy, Acupuncture - Marin County
description: I am an Integrative Naturopathic Doctor, an Acupuncturist and Women's Health Expert specilaizing in Fertility, Menopause, Bio-Identical Hormones and Adrenal Issues.
cleaned_text: Naturopathic Doctors (ND's) are trained to serve as primary care general practitioners who are experts in the prevention, diagnosis, management, and treatment of both acute and chronic health conditions. Naturopathic Medicine is a unique and distinct system of health care that emphasizes the use of prevention and natural, non-invasive therapeutics including clinical nutrition, botanical medicine, hydrotherapy, physical medicine, and counseling. Naturopathic therapies can be used to complement treatments used by conventionally trained medical doctors. The result is a patient-centered approach that strives to provide the most appropriate treatment for an individual's needs.
